GreenhouseLevel2Description: Plot 30x30. Expands cellar, adds indoor greenhouse and automatic watering.
GreenhouseLevel3Description: Plot 50x50. Expands cellar and indoor greenhouse.
GreenhouseLevel4Description: Plot 75x75. Expands cellar and makes the indoor greenhouse larger.
GreenhouseLevel5Description: Plot 100x100. Expands cellar and makes the indoor greenhouse even larger.
